verses.text: \w Woe|strong="H1945"\w* to thee that \w spoilest|strong="H7703"\w*, and thou \add wast\add* not \w spoiled|strong="H7703"\w*; and dealest \w treacherously|strong="H0898"\w*, and they dealt not \w treacherously|strong="H0898"\w* with thee! when thou shalt \w cease|strong="H8552"\w* to \w spoil|strong="H7703"\w*, thou shalt be \w spoiled|strong="H7703"\w*; \add and\add* when thou shalt make an \w end|strong="H5239"\w* to deal \w treacherously|strong="H0898"\w*, they shall deal \w treacherously|strong="H0898"\w* with thee.

O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, be \w gracious|strong="H2603"\w* unto us; we have \w waited|strong="H6960"\w* for thee: be thou their \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* every \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, our \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* also in the \w time|strong="H6256"\w* of \w trouble|strong="H6869"\w*.

At the \w noise|strong="H6963"\w* of the \w tumult|strong="H1995"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w fled|strong="H5074"\w*; at the lifting \w up|strong="H7427"\w* of thyself the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* were \w scattered|strong="H5310"\w*.

And your \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* shall be \w gathered|strong="H0622"\w* \add like\add* the \w gathering|strong="H0625"\w* of the \w caterpiller|strong="H2625"\w*: as the running to and \w fro|strong="H4944"\w* of \w locusts|strong="H1357"\w* shall he \w run|strong="H8264"\w* upon them.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* is \w exalted|strong="H7682"\w*; for he \w dwelleth|strong="H7931"\w* on \w high|strong="H4791"\w*: he hath \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* with \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* and \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*.

And \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w* and \w knowledge|strong="H1847"\w* shall be the \w stability|strong="H0530"\w* of thy \w times|strong="H6256"\w*, \add and\add* \w strength|strong="H2633"\w* of \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*: the \w fear|strong="H3374"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add is\add* his \w treasure|strong="H0214"\w*.\f + \fr 33.6 \ft salvation: Heb. salvations\f*

Behold, their valiant \w ones|strong="H0691"\w* shall \w cry|strong="H6817"\w* \w without|strong="H2351"\w*: the \w ambassadors|strong="H4397"\w* of \w peace|strong="H7965"\w* shall \w weep|strong="H1058"\w* \w bitterly|strong="H4751"\w*.\f + \fr 33.7 \ft valiant…: or, messengers\f*

The \w highways|strong="H4546"\w* lie \w waste|strong="H8074"\w*, the wayfaring \w man|strong="H5674"\w* \w ceaseth|strong="H7673"\w*: he hath \w broken|strong="H6565"\w* the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, he hath \w despised|strong="H3988"\w* the \w cities|strong="H5892"\w*, he \w regardeth|strong="H2803"\w* no \w man|strong="H0582"\w*.

The \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w mourneth|strong="H0056"\w* \add and\add* \w languisheth|strong="H0535"\w*: \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w* is \w ashamed|strong="H2659"\w* \add and\add* hewn \w down|strong="H7060"\w*: \w Sharon|strong="H8289"\w* is like a \w wilderness|strong="H6160"\w*; and \w Bashan|strong="H1316"\w* and \w Carmel|strong="H3760"\w* shake \w off|strong="H5287"\w* \add their fruits\add*.\f + \fr 33.9 \ft hewn…: or, withered away\f*
Now will I \w rise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; now will I be \w exalted|strong="H7426"\w*; now will I lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* myself.

Ye shall \w conceive|strong="H2029"\w* \w chaff|strong="H2842"\w*, ye shall bring \w forth|strong="H3205"\w* \w stubble|strong="H7179"\w*: your \w breath|strong="H7307"\w*, \add as\add* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*, shall \w devour|strong="H0398"\w* you.

And the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* shall be \add as\add* the \w burnings|strong="H4955"\w* of \w lime|strong="H7875"\w*: \add as\add* \w thorns|strong="H6975"\w* cut \w up|strong="H3683"\w* shall they be \w burned|strong="H3341"\w* in the \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

¶ \w Hear|strong="H8085"\w*, ye \add that are\add* far \w off|strong="H7350"\w*, what I have \w done|strong="H6213"\w*; and, ye \add that are\add* \w near|strong="H7138"\w*, \w acknowledge|strong="H3045"\w* my \w might|strong="H1369"\w*.

The \w sinners|strong="H2400"\w* in \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* are \w afraid|strong="H6342"\w*; \w fearfulness|strong="H7461"\w* hath \w surprised|strong="H0270"\w* the \w hypocrites|strong="H2611"\w*. Who among us shall \w dwell|strong="H1481"\w* with the \w devouring|strong="H0398"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*? who among us shall \w dwell|strong="H1481"\w* with \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w burnings|strong="H4168"\w*?

He that \w walketh|strong="H1980"\w* \w righteously|strong="H6666"\w*, and \w speaketh|strong="H1696"\w* \w uprightly|strong="H4339"\w*; he that \w despiseth|strong="H3988"\w* the \w gain|strong="H1215"\w* of \w oppressions|strong="H4642"\w*, that \w shaketh|strong="H5287"\w* his \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* from \w holding|strong="H8551"\w* of \w bribes|strong="H7810"\w*, that \w stoppeth|strong="H0331"\w* his \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* from \w hearing|strong="H8085"\w* of \w blood|strong="H1818"\w*, and \w shutteth|strong="H6105"\w* his \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* from \w seeing|strong="H7200"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*;\f + \fr 33.15 \ft righteously: Heb. in righteousnesses\f*\f + \fr 33.15 \ft uprightly: Heb. uprightnesses\f*\f + \fr 33.15 \ft oppressions: or, deceits\f*\f + \fr 33.15 \ft blood: Heb. bloods\f*

He shall \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* on \w high|strong="H4791"\w*: his place of \w defence|strong="H4869"\w* \add shall be\add* the \w munitions|strong="H4679"\w* of \w rocks|strong="H5553"\w*: \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* shall be \w given|strong="H5414"\w* him; his \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \add shall be\add* \w sure|strong="H0539"\w*.\f + \fr 33.16 \ft high: Heb. heights, or, high places\f*

Thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* shall \w see|strong="H2372"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* in his \w beauty|strong="H3308"\w*: they shall \w behold|strong="H7200"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* that is very far \w off|strong="H4801"\w*.\f + \fr 33.17 \ft that…: Heb. of far distances\f*

Thine \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* shall \w meditate|strong="H1897"\w* \w terror|strong="H0367"\w*. Where \add is\add* the \w scribe|strong="H5608"\w*? where \add is\add* the \w receiver|strong="H8254"\w*? where \add is\add* he that \w counted|strong="H5608"\w* the \w towers|strong="H4026"\w*?\f + \fr 33.18 \ft receiver: Heb. weigher?\f*

Thou shalt not \w see|strong="H7200"\w* a \w fierce|strong="H3267"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, a \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of a \w deeper|strong="H6012"\w* \w speech|strong="H8193"\w* than thou canst \w perceive|strong="H8085"\w*; of a \w stammering|strong="H3932"\w* \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w*, \add that thou canst\add* not \w understand|strong="H0998"\w*.\f + \fr 33.19 \ft stammering: or, ridiculous\f*

\w Look|strong="H2372"\w* upon \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, the \w city|strong="H7151"\w* of our \w solemnities|strong="H4150"\w*: thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* a \w quiet|strong="H7600"\w* \w habitation|strong="H5116"\w*, a \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* \add that\add* shall not be taken \w down|strong="H6813"\w*; not one of the \w stakes|strong="H3489"\w* thereof shall \w ever|strong="H5331"\w* be \w removed|strong="H5265"\w*, neither shall any of the \w cords|strong="H2256"\w* thereof be \w broken|strong="H5423"\w*.

But there the \w glorious|strong="H0117"\w* \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \add will be\add* unto us a \w place|strong="H4725"\w* of \w broad|strong="H7342"\w* \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w* \add and\add* \w streams|strong="H2975"\w*; wherein shall \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w no|strong="H1077"\w* \w galley|strong="H0590"\w* with \w oars|strong="H7885"\w*, neither shall \w gallant|strong="H0117"\w* \w ship|strong="H6716"\w* \w pass|strong="H5674"\w* thereby.\f + \fr 33.21 \ft of…: Heb. broad of spaces, or, hands\f*

For the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* our \w judge|strong="H8199"\w*, the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* our \w lawgiver|strong="H2710"\w*, the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \add is\add* our \w king|strong="H4428"\w*; he will \w save|strong="H3467"\w* us.  +  r 33.22  t lawgiver: Heb. statutemaker *

Thy \w tacklings|strong="H2256"\w* are \w loosed|strong="H5203"\w*; they could not \w well|strong="H3653"\w* \w strengthen|strong="H2388"\w* their \w mast|strong="H8650"\w*, they could not \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* the \w sail|strong="H5251"\w*: then is the \w prey|strong="H5706"\w* of a \w great|strong="H4766"\w* \w spoil|strong="H7998"\w* \w divided|strong="H2505"\w*; the \w lame|strong="H6455"\w* \w take|strong="H0962"\w* the \w prey|strong="H0957"\w*.\f + \fr 33.23 \ft Thy…: or, They have forsaken thy tacklings\f*

And the \w inhabitant|strong="H7934"\w* shall not \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, I am \w sick|strong="H2470"\w*: the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* that \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* therein \add shall be\add* \w forgiven|strong="H5375"\w* \add their\add* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w*.
